body.description: The Acer R Series 23. 8" wide viewing IPS display shows every detail clearly and vivid without color difference from any viewing angle. Its zero frame design puts no boundary on your visual enjoyment while the brushed hairline finish stand matches any environment. With Full HD resolution and superior 100 Million: 1 contrast ratio you get detailed imagery for viewing photos, browsing the web and also makes viewing documents side by side easy. It also supports VGA, DVI & HDMI inputs so you can easily power and extend the enjoyment from your smartphone or tablet on Full HD display. What's more, this display features power-saving technologies to conserve cost and resources. (UM. QR0AA. 001). Environmental certification: MPR II.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Beauty From All Angles The Acer R240HY 23.8” IPS display shows every detail clearly and vivid without color difference from any viewing angle. Its zero frame design puts no boundary on your visual enjoyment while the brushed hairline finish stand matches any environment. It also supports VGA, DVI & HDMI inputs so you can easily power and extend the enjoyment from your smartphone or tablet on Full HD display. 23.8” Full HD (1920 x 1080) widescreen IPS display 178 degree viewing angles Zero Frame Design -5 to 15 degree adjustable stand VGA, DVI (w/HDCP) & HDMI (v1.4) Ports

Features Great Visuals This 23.8" LCD provides excellent detail with a stunning 1920 x 1080 resolution, making it perfect for productivity and multimedia applications. Stunning Color at any Angle IPS provides advanced in plane switching technology for premium color performance at any viewing angle. Zero Frame Design The zero frame design creates a unique visual experience without boundaries which is also ideal when adding 2 or more monitors side-by side.

Ergonomic Tilt With an easy adjustment, the display tilts from -5° to 15° letting you choose the best sightline for media enjoyment and to have the best view possible. Better for Your Eyes With Acer Flicker-less technology say good-bye to annoying screen flickering, and with a blue light filter you’re shielded from eye straining blue light. Energy-friendly Designed with eco-friendliness in mind, the R240HY features Acer EcoDisplay design that emphasize recyclability, waste reduction, energy efficiency and safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitor, just remember...
reviews.reviewText: Great monitor at a great price! Everything looks great on it and it runs really well, no screen tearing or anything like that.I will say if you're going to get this make sure you know that it DOES NOT have built in speakers. I knew that going into it so I had some desktop ones at the ready, but I can see how someone wouldn't know if they were just looking for a display and not reading everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget monitor
reviews.reviewText: The Acer IPS Monitor is an impressive display that offers vibrant colors and excellent viewing angles. Its IPS (In-Plane Switching) technology provides superior color accuracy and consistency, making it a great choice for graphic design, video editing, and multimedia consumption.The monitor's Full HD resolution delivers sharp and clear visuals, whether I'm browsing the web, watching videos, or playing games. The 23.8-inch screen size strikes a good balance between screen real estate and desk space, offering a comfortable viewing experience.The slim bezels on the monitor create an immersive and modern look, making it suitable for multi-monitor setups or as a centerpiece in a clean and minimalist workspace.Furthermore, the monitor comes with a variety of connectivity options, including HDMI, VGA, and DisplayPort, providing flexibility for connecting to various devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid monitor for working!
reviews.reviewText: Great price for a 27" monitor, very easy on my eyes while working. Has mounts for a desk stand and rotates in any direction. I love that it has a switch to turn it on and off, so weird Samsung joystick to fuss with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great color and picture quality crisp. Nicely made and easy to setup. Very good for the price. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: I bought this new Acer monitor to replace my 13 year old Acer. Man, what a difference a decade or so makes when it comes to technology. The images on this new one are crisp, bright and the thin frame is unobtrusive.I'm really pleased with this purchase. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bigger is better
reviews.reviewText: A quality hi def monitor at a good price. If you're an old dinosaur like me who works from home and still uses a desktop computer this is a really nice monitor. Also good for watching youtube videos if you're stuck in a boring zoom meeting with your "team".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitor for the Money
reviews.reviewText: Very good monitor, works great and is clear as the day is long...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Great size, good picture quality, easy assembly. Do yourself a favor and read the instructions. Took me 10 minutes to figure out how to turn it on lol it’s a small button on the back of the monitor by the way not at the bottom of the monitor near the power cord lol.
Muy buen producto, fácil de instalar y cumple con su cometido.

reviews.reviewTitle: an amazing monitor if you get it on sale for 149 ...
reviews.reviewText: an amazing monitor if you get it on sale for 149 CAD. at it's regular price it is a bit pricey for what you're getting; i'd wait for amazon to restock and have it drop in price to 149-159 CAD.pros:- best IPS monitor near 24 inches for the price- images are just straight up better on an IPS panel- once you buy this monitor, you will never want to look at bezels again (yes it is that nice) - two of them together would be amazing but for gaming/youtube, i recommend incorporating a panel actually designed for gaming into a multi-screen set up (reason below)- amazing for movies and content- suitable for light games but doesn't compare to a screen that can actually drive over 60 fps- it does tilt, like with all acer monitor stands, dont be afraid of breaking the screen and it WILL tilt towards or away from you. the monitor must be fully assembled before tilting; you cant tilt it while its partly assembled when you’re unboxing. hold the top of the screen and the stand simultaneously and put your back into itcons:- its full non-on-sale price - you'd probably want to get this on sale- not vesa compatible which is fine if you don't plan on mounting in the future (but should definitely take this into account if you plan on creating a "forever" set up; i'd recommend looking into VESA mounting for "forever" setups)- in reality, it's not a gaming monitor but that's why i have the GN246hl beside itoverall 8/10 monitor for $149
Nunca pensé que iba a encontrar un monitor de buen tamaño, excelente calidad a un precio tan bajo, la verdad vale cada peso que costó y hasta más

Positives:1. Good viewing angles.2. Nice large size is comfortable for daily use.3. Excellent color and brightness4. Excellent price for the size and qualityNegatives:1. I got the 24 inch and the pixel density is a bit low at 1080p. I can notice pixelation when I sit close to it2. Stand does not allow for up and down height adjustments, only tilting3. 1080p/60hz is not good for gaming, nor did I buy it for gaming. Try to go with 1440P, 144hz if you want a monitor for gaming and your computer can drive it.4. Only one mode where you can adjust your settings and the brightness is difficult to adjust from there. Too many steps and the buttons are annoying to use. Not a problem if you don't really need to change your brightness.

Lo primero que llama la atención de este monitor es su estética, tiene acabado tipo piano y y el borde es ultra delgado lo cual lo hace atractivo. Lucirá bastante en tu escritorio.Ha funcionado muy bien en actividades cotidianas con la computadora y de oficina; el reflejo es mínimo en el monitor.Los botones para acceder a su configuración se encuentran en la parte de abajo del marco; el acceso a ellos puede ser un poco complicado y aunque cuando ingresas al menú de opciones te aparece una ayuda visual del lugar donde debes de presionar, no llega a ser tan sencillo, hay que practicar un poco. No obstante, creo que muchos monitores apuestan por la estética y ocultan los botones de acceso a su configuración.Opté por crear una configuración personalizada al inicio; esta personalización y otros modos predeterminados del monitor pueden alternarse a través de los botones disponibles. Los modos con los que cuenta el monitor son: Personalizado, Eco, Estándar, Gráficos y Película.El monitor cuenta con entrada HDMI, VGA y DVI.Me hubiese gustado que este monitor fuera compatible con la herramienta de Acer Display Widget para sacarle mayor provecho pero no fue así.
